subject: Re: Radio interview about making a "Franks Box" type device
author: Steve Hultay
full_text:
Hey Mike,

I'll be tuning in....Good Luck and great job in getting the word out to 
others.

-Steve H.



--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "M.A. Coletta (Mike)" 
<michaelcoletta@...> wrote:
>
> This evening I will be the guest on the Lights Out! radio program 
> hosted by Peter Franz and Alexis Camarda from Long Island Society for 
> Paranormal Research. Peter Franz is also a co-host on TAPS Family 
> Radio.  Last week Rosemary Ellen Guiley was their guest. You can hear 
> her interview on the archived show at 
> http://www.blogtalkradio.com/Lightsoutradio/
> 
> You can hear my interview on tonight's LIVE Lights Out! show at 8pm 
> Eastern time at:
> http://www.blogtalkradio.com/Lightsoutradio/2007/12/18/Franks-Box
> 
> - Mike
>
